subject: Driver suggestion
description_text:
Hello, Simsonn Support Team
You can create presets for games so they load automatically when the game
loads. This would be a very convenient feature, so you don't have to go
into the program and it automatically loads the right preset.
Thank you for your product.

conversations.body_text: Hi Wortrext,    Okay, we shall give this matter serious consideration. Thank you for your suggestion!
